@ all who downloaded from extratorrent from my previous post

That Crysis2Patch19.exe file seems infected !

Rename that .exe to .rar and extract

You find 2 extracted files - the small file "dll.exe" is TROJAN - remove it

The big file is the patch - it is ok

I recommend you scan your computers with Antimalware
from Malwarebytes dot com

Much props and thanks for the patch.  I downloaded the patch to my Z drive (where the game is installed).  When I start the patch it is taking forever searching for the game directory obv starting with the C: drive.  After watching it crawl through my C: drive, I watched it search right through the game directory (which was renamed).   While I have my fingers crossed and faith that your patch will actually fix the game loading crash, the Skidrow 1.9 update quickly identified the game directory with no problem.

This all installs fine, but I can't seem to install the high res texture pack. I tried downloading it from three locations, with the same results: "Failed to extract file from archive: diff_000001.dif."  I tried restarting, uninstalling the game, installing the patch from a different location, and using different locations for the texture pack.  Nothing works.  The tessellation patch works fine.  
Is there any workaround to this, like files that I can copy over manually?  Thanks in advance.
